meta.name: title
meta.content: eaves Cerritos - Apartments in Artesia, CA | AvalonBay Communities

div.span: Welcome to eaves Cerritos – where sensible apartment living meets a practical cost of living. We offer quality Artesia apartments with a few little extras, like a private balcony, a relaxing pool, gas barbecues, clubhouse and 24-hour on-call maintenance service. Plus, our technology package, eavesConnect, offers high-speed and common area WiFi, electronic locks, digital resident services including the ability to submit service requests and pay your rent online, and more. Upgrade any home to Furnished+ and enjoy the convenience of turnkey living. Simply put our apartments in Artesia offer more of what you hope for. Better than you bargained for. So, what are you waiting for? Artesia Apartments by eaves Whether you've lived in Artesia your whole life or are just moving here for the first time, you deserve an apartment where you can live comfortably. Conveniently located close to the 91 and 605 freeways, our Artesia apartments provide easy access to popular attractions like the Cerritos Mall, Time 2 Paintball and Kathy's Hideaway. People looking for a great meal can take a stroll to The India Restaurant, Kabuki Japanese Restaurant, Salo-Salo Grill or Mr. Lee's Barbeque. Artesia is also part of Los Angeles’s Gateway Cities which is a hub for technology, tourism, transportation and international trade industries. Artesia Apartment Community Residents of eaves Cerritos will enjoy the comfort and convenience of a peaceful lifestyle that we provide. We provide our residents a range of on-site community amenities including beautifully landscaped gardens and a well-equipped fitness center. We’ll take care of any issues that arise, quickly and smoothly, allowing you to focus on the important parts of your life. Contact us to schedule an appointment and learn more about your new apartment in Artesia today.

div.h2: this is the real deal. this is eaves.

a.div: Understanding what you value goes beyond offering you a quality apartment. It means having a respectful, friendly staff that you know you can depend on when you need them. Giving you one less thing to worry about and one more way to feel at home in your new community. That’s eaves.
We know you value convenience. That’s why all of our locations are also carefully selected to put you within reach of local shopping, restaurants and public transportation.

You made a promise to yourself to live within your means. That doesn't mean living without. Take advantage of our special resident discounts, early deposit refund program, and longer lease term options.

div.div: Room dimensions, square footage, and features shown on the floor plan drawings are approximate and may vary between individual apartments that have similar layouts. Furniture shown on the floor plan drawings is representative and individual apartments come unfurnished unless specified otherwise. Quoted rent is per month for new move-ins to the community, based on the move-in date selected. Pricing may vary based on lease term. Quoted rent does not including other fees and charges that may be part of your lease (i.e. utilities, parking, etc.). Please contact the community for details. Prior to signing a lease, quoted rent, specials, availability, and other terms and conditions are subject to change without notice. Washington State - We require our own screening and do not accept comprehensive reusable tenant screening reports.

div.p: Curious about the community layout? You can download the community site map here.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Homes fully furnished and connected to give you the lifestyle you deserve. Flexible lease terms for the ultimate convenience.

a.div: Offering a wealth of resident resources, our Relocation Advantage program assists in making your transition a smooth one.

div.p: Moving can be stressful, but we’re here to welcome you home. Connect with one of our team members to learn more.

li.a: Do Not Sell My Personal Information

better than you expected.","description":"Welcome to eaves Cerritos – where sensible apartment living meets a practical cost of living. We offer quality Artesia apartments with a few little extras, like a private balcony, a relaxing pool, gas barbecues, clubhouse and 24-hour on-call maintenance service. Plus, our technology package, eavesConnect, offers high-speed and common area WiFi, electronic locks, digital resident services including the ability to submit service requests and pay your rent online, and more. Upgrade any home to Furnished+ and enjoy the convenience of turnkey living. Simply put our apartments in Artesia offer more of what you hope for. Better than you bargained for. So, what are you waiting for? Artesia Apartments by eaves Whether you've lived in Artesia your whole life or are just moving here for the first time, you deserve an apartment where you can live comfortably. Conveniently located close to the 91 and 605 freeways, our Artesia apartments provide easy access to popular attractions like the Cerritos Mall, Time 2 Paintball and Kathy's Hideaway. People looking for a great meal can take a stroll to The India Restaurant, Kabuki Japanese Restaurant, Salo-Salo Grill or Mr. Lee's Barbeque. Artesia is also part of Los Angeles’s Gateway Cities which is a hub for technology, tourism, transportation and international trade industries. Artesia Apartment Community Residents of eaves Cerritos will enjoy the comfort and convenience of a peaceful lifestyle that we provide. We provide our residents a range of on-site community amenities including beautifully landscaped gardens and a well-equipped fitness center. We’ll take care of any issues that arise, quickly and smoothly, allowing you to focus on the important parts of your life.
